participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and sociable, enjoys sharing interests with others.
participant_1.background: I love hockey. I have flown out of the country. I studied business as my major. My befriend is from out of town.

participant_2.name: Marie Dupont
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, loves diving into diverse stories and expressing ideas through art.
participant_2.background: My favorite hobby is reading. I was born in France and moved to Canada. I am a digital artist. My husband is an author and we have twins together. My favorite author is Stephen King.

content.text: I love to read, draw, and play video games.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but my favorite authors are Stephen King, Neil Gaiman, and Margaret Atwood.
I like Stephen King too! What's your favorite book of his?
I think my favorite book of his is "The Stand." It's a post-apocalyptic novel about a virus that kills most of the world's population.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
What do you like to draw?
I like to draw characters from video games and anime. I also like to draw fantasy landscapes.
I love video games too! What's your favorite video game?
My favorite video game is "The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time." It's a classic!
I love that game too! It's so much fun!
I agree! It's one of my all-time favorite games.
What's your favorite thing about the game?
I love the story and the characters. I also love the gameplay. It's so much fun to explore the world and solve puzzles.
I agree! It's a really well-made game.
I do! It's one of my favorite games of all time.
